title: The Creeper Village
description: Not all creepers want to blow up and hurt other mobs! There are friendly creepers who have their own village and stay away from humans and other mobs. What is it like living as a friendly creeper and how are they different from the other creepers. Read Mike's diary and find out how's life as a Creeper. Mike has lived his whole life in his quiet village on the mountain top. His village is secluded and peaceful. The only thing that makes his village different? It is full of creepers. The friendly creepers live away from the rest of the Over World and keep to themselves. In an attempt to save their village from the sudden attacks of wither skeletons coming from the Nether, Mike, together with his other fellow friendly creepers set out on a quest to seek for help. But with all the dangers they are about to face in such a strange place, can they really find what they are looking for? What kind of adventure awaits Mikeâ€™s group as they journey on towards the unknown?
